column6:
"THE CLONE SAGA" ,2006,8
Spidey is reeling from the exposure of the Scorpion's unbelievable identity. But even that pales besides the string of revelations awaiting him such as: Who kidnapped Mary Jane and what does he/she want? Who does Spider-Man struggle against in the old warehouse where he fought his first battle? Who is waiting for him in the house in Queens he and his Aunt May abandoned recently? Your jaw will drop and your mind will go numb when you learn the solution to these mysteries. And the world of Peter Parker will never be the same. Part 3 of 5.
32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Mark Bagley | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | inker:John Dell | letterer:Cory Petit | colorist:Justin Ponsor
